title: Pare1981
author: Pare1981
content: I am selling new accounts with multiple bins to replace barterAccount price: $350There are 3 options to load the account:You can use webmoneyz, paymaster24 or I can load it for you for a 5% feeContact me hereWith the account you can have the following cards active at a timeZar keeps 2 vcc at a timeUsd keeps 3 vcc at a timeGbp keeps 2 vcc at a timeEuro keeps 2 vcc at a timeAud keeps 2 vcc at a time

comments.author: S4ndSt0rm
comments.body: Escrow?Given your reputation here nobody will deal with you without escrow.
